text: The 2022 mid-year rugby union internationals (also known as the summer internationals in the Northern Hemisphere) are international rugby union matches that are mostly played in the Southern Hemisphere during the July international window. ==Fixtures== ===July=== \---- \---- ==See also== * 2022 end-of-year rugby union internationals ==References== 2022 Category:2022 in rugby union
title: 2022 July rugby union tests
